pkgmetadata.longdescription: # jinja2-strcaseA python package for converting string case in jinja2 templates (including cookiecutter).It is a port of the go package [strcase](https://github.com/iancoleman/strcase)## Installationjinja2-strcase is available for download from PyPI via pip:```$ pip install jinja2-strcase```## Example```from jinja2 import Environmentenv = Environment(extensions=['jinja2_strcase.StrcaseExtension'])# This will convert 'Any kind of string' -> 'any_kind_of_string'template = env.from_string("{% 'Any kind of string' | to_snake }")template.render()```| Function | Result ||---------------------------------|----------------------|| `to_snake` | `any_kind_of_string` || `to_screaming_snake` | `ANY_KIND_OF_STRING` || `to_kebab` | `any-kind-of-string` || `to_screaming_kebab` | `ANY-KIND-OF-STRING` || `to_camel` | `AnyKindOfString` || `to_lower_camel` | `anyKindOfString` |
